Flying Carpet

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 304
national discount [nationrebate]: #72 MA Na'Ba - Queens of the Desert
#33 EA Ubar - Kingdom of the Unseen
flyingmaxtotalsize [flyingmaxtotalsize]: 14
flyingmapmove [flyingmapmove]: 20

Requires 15A to forge (A3)

This carpet can be used to fly through as many as three provinces per turn. It can carry 7 human-sized units, 4 mounted units, or 3 giants.
